participant_1.name: Jordan
participant_1.background: I produce music for artists. My pet's name is Charlie. My favorite food is pizza. I listen to rap music. I drive a 2015 Honda Civic.

participant_2.name: Lily
participant_2.personality: Playful and imaginative with a love for singing.
participant_2.background: I like to look at blocks and sing about letters. I am four years old. I like to talk but people have a hard time understanding. When I grow up I want to be a dog.

content.text: Hello! I am good, because I'm so young
I love to listen to music do you produce music for artists?
No, but I want to be a dog
I have a dog, he is a cat named george. Do you listen to rap music?
I like to look at blocks and sing
I sing along with my dog, he is a black cat.
